00014 class InsideUtil {
00015    public:
00026       template<class P>
00027       static int isLeft( const P& p0, const P& p1, const P& p2 ) 
00028       {
00029          double res =
00030             double( (double)GfxUtil::getCoordX( p1 ) - GfxUtil::getCoordX( p0 ) ) * 
00031                   ( (double)GfxUtil::getCoordY( p2 ) - GfxUtil::getCoordY( p0 ) ) -
00032             double( (double)GfxUtil::getCoordX( p2 ) - GfxUtil::getCoordX( p0 ) ) * 
00033                   ( (double)GfxUtil::getCoordY( p1 ) - GfxUtil::getCoordY( p0 ) );
00034        
00035          if ( res > 0.5 ) {
00036             return 1;
00037          } else if ( res < -0.5 ) {
00038             return -1;
00039          } else {
00040             return 0; 
00041          }
00042       }

00061       template<class POINT_ITERATOR, class P, class XY_HELPER>
00062       static bool inside( const POINT_ITERATOR& begin,
00063                           const POINT_ITERATOR& end, 
00064                           const P& p, 
00065                           const XY_HELPER& helper )
00066       {
00067          int wn = 0;    // the winding number counter
00068         
00069          // loop through all edges of the polygon
00070          POINT_ITERATOR it = begin;
00071          POINT_ITERATOR prevIt = it;
00072          ++it;
00073          while( it != end ) {
00074             // edge from V[i] to V[i+1]
00075             if ( helper.getY( *prevIt ) <= 
00076                  helper.getY( p ) ) {   // start y <= P.y
00077                if ( helper.getY( *it ) > 
00078                     helper.getY( p ) )  // an upward crossing
00079                   if (InsideUtil::isLeft( 
00080                            *prevIt, *it, p ) > 0)// P left of edge
00081                      ++wn;              // have a valid up intersect
00082             } else {                    // start y > P.y (no test needed)
00083                if ( helper.getY( *it ) <= 
00084                     helper.getY( p ) )       // a downward crossing
00085                   if (InsideUtil::isLeft( 
00086                            *prevIt, *it, p ) < 0)// P right of edge
00087                --wn;                        // have a valid down intersect
00088             }
00089             prevIt = it;
00090             ++it;
00091          }
00092          // Odd winding number means it's inside.
00093          return wn & 1;
00094       }
00095       
00116       template<class POINT_ITERATOR, class P>
00117       static bool inside( const POINT_ITERATOR& begin,
00118                           const POINT_ITERATOR& end, 
00119                           const P& p ) {
00120          typename P::XYHelper helper;
00121          return inside(begin, end, p, helper);
00122       }
